text: palamu test tharagayen kodewwanta jaya.
amor gana man tharahin hitiya thamayi.
owuhu wikshiptha wuha.
melesa, owun thama sannamaya wiwidha kshetha්rayanta yomukota, ema kshetha්rayanhi da sarthakawa wyapara katayuthu karagena yathi.
sudu neluma ko sora bora wawe widiyowa balanna methana obanna
ee anumathiya ada labila thiyenawa.
honda honda sellan eliwena jameta.
krikat athuru kamituwak kerehi awadhanaya
kenek:ithin api dennama ekathu wela hoyamu
thaman ee thaththwayata path kala nodanuwathkamata erehiwa siya jiwithaya kapa kirimayi.

19 ta wiruddha wannan idiripath karana mulikama tharkayak wanne rataka jathika aarakshawehila menma ratak arajika nowi pawathwa ganimehila widhayaka janadhipathi dhurayak ratakata awashya bawaya.namuth ithihasaya piriksana kawarakuta wuwada meya itha puhu tharkayak bawata haduna gatha haka.78di hadunwa dun mema aththanomathika widhayaka janapathi kramaya jathika aarakshawa arbudayehila menma rata arajika wima kerehi balapa aakaraya itha pahasuwen haduna gatha hakiya.
saha ingrisi nisa ape samajaya hithana pathana widiya wenas wuna aakaraya gana ee lipi walin sulu washayen awadhanayata lak wuna.
dan ee udaw labenna oona welawa.
"ayi umbaalage gewal paththa ganwathurata yata welada..?"

awashya ayata dan thibena margayama sulu wenaskam sahithawama bhawitha kala hakiya.adhiwengi manga idikirima nisa merata janathawata sruju ha wakra rakiya pansiyakata adhika pramanayak himiwa atha.adhiwengi manga nisa pahasuwa salasenne guwan thotupalata gaman ganna manginta pamanak nowe.katunayaka dakwa winadi 20 kin gaman kara ethan sita migamuwata, halawathata, puththalamata, anuradhapurayata me aadi oonama pradeshayakata gaman kirimata man peth wiwara wanu atha.nirmala kothalawala niyojya amathyawarayage nirikshana charikawe pradhana aramuna wuye mema margaye wada katayuthu ikman karaganimayi.adhiwengi marga wyapruthiye adhyakshawaraya athulu niladharingen thorathuru wimasu amathiwaraya upades dunne margaye wada katayuthu kadinam karana lesayi.paliyagoda wata rawume pawathina marga thadabadaya thawa wasara 1 1/2 kin pamana awasan wanu atha.
ekama shri lankika jathiyak lesa nagi sitimata apekshawen kriyathmaka karana "ahanna" wadasatahana heta (23) udasana 10ta mahiyanganaya - sorabora shri ashokarama wiharasthanaye di pawathwe.
sh ri lanka muslim kong rasaye siti nasigiya nayakayeku wu em. ech. em. ashraf mahatha mema wishwawid yalaya pihituwimata mulikathwaya gath bawa sandahan weyi.
oomanaye al-kod pradeshaye nawathi thibu wahana kipaya
sulan adhika we nam ha pala usata wadi athnam aadharakayak situwanna.
melo sansarayak therenne na. 6, 7 wasara waladinam hitiye madamla dennek (ape iskole mislata kiyanne madam kiyala). 8, 9 wasare hitiye sar kenek ...
eyata katak, lama pedesak thiyenawa.
agka papthumage mithrayeku lesa ithali siramadiriyaka jiwathwenawa. 1987 di agkage mawath 1997di agkage sahodarayath papthuma munagasi thibenawa.

epamanak noweyi, hata – haththawa dashakaye sinhala wruththantha chithrapata athara wishishta sthanayak (edath – adath) sugathapala senarath yapage ‘hanthane kathawa’ chithrapataya ath kara ganna bawa apa nopakilawa prakasha kirima yuthukamak.

ee anuwa ramayanaya adhyayanaya kirime di pahadili wanne walmiki wisin awasthanochithawa katha puwatha thulata charitha athulu kara athi bawath, eki charitha sahithya rasa jananaya wana aakarayata hasuruwa athi bawath ya.
ti-10 tharagawaliyata saja giya sha්ri lanka kandayame pa්rashnaya pupura yayi - palath kandayame nama wenas karala ka්ridakayanuth wenas kala - puhunukaru - awishka...
pasuwa paswaru 5ta kolambain basa nuwara basayaka patawagena udispaththuwa siya nawathane adayata sangawa thabana ladi.
wanara sathwa jawarama pilibanda johannasbarg nuwaradi elidakwunu nawathama daththa magin ema jawarama sambandhayen wadath sawistharathmaka chithrayak laba deyi.

mama ithin oya aw asse ohe gobba thaleta kiyala damma "dan mokada anti karanne, akkata kol ekak denna weyida kiyala" eeka ahuwama kattiyage ahi bola athurudahan wuna..oya eda dada waliya konakath thibila thiyenne ahichcha eewaye hatiyata mundala kageda hattayak waraddala mahuwa sin ekak thamayi...ithin as pitin athurudahan wunath pudumayakya!
amma kenek widiyata danena sathuta monawageda?
oba hata eya oonama kisidu hoduwawak nothaba obage siyalu aayojana ahimi wanu atha.
wruththiya wada, adhyapana wada, ee asse blog karmanthaya sahenna kada watila.
eheth pasal sisunta eya kala haki yayi mama no sithami.
ada badu mila aduwela na.

ithin thunsiya hatapas dawasema rayis.aasawata wath gedara gani uyala dena bathkatak kanna na.thriwil kiyanakota mathakune ara mama liyapu rathu akkage kathawa mathakada,ee rathu akkage puthath dan tawume thriwil ekak hayar karanawa api uuta wijitha kiyamu.uu bandala tika kalekin gedara aarthika prashna nisa wenna athi pawula ratagiya.dan wijitha thani thandale rassawa karagena gedara innawa.ohoma innakota thanikama kammalikama paluwa saha mol amaruwath danenawane.mu mokada kale paren eha paththe wendesiye wikunapu waththata padinchiyata aawa miniha dala giya kanthawak ekka ayi hondayiyak patan gaththa.ee ganukena wijithata wada godak wadumal kiyanne ganige loku duwath muge wayase wage.uuta eewa ganak na moko gedara ekkan endaya kotuwa paninawa witharane kiyala digin digatama ayi hondayiya pawathwagena giya.wade jayatama yaddi ithin katakatha pathirenawane oowa game ganungen hanganna bane.wijithage akkalatath me kathawa aaranchi una.ee akkala hari sarayi.akkala denna muta katha karala sarayak dekak awawada kala.
me lipi malawa liyanna hithala tika kalayak wunath liyanna kal gaththe karunu karana hari hati ekathukaraganna uwamana nisa .
padipela mudunedi aaryan aata katha kala.
pitipasse sapatama yanna puluwan ne.
samahara wita me sen katha dannawath athi, ahalath ...
-on patan gaththa ...
balalekuge paramadhipathyaya (ketikathawa)
pada sho dapu sachchakayawa bukiye kament dala cha karawanna thibba.
arabi wasanthayakata ida nodena bawa janapathi awadharanaya karayi
pilip thawaduratath maha aleksandar anuwa yamin romaya athpath kara ganimata kamaththen sitiyeya.
koyi tharam sundara athithayak mage game apita thibunada, ee dewal mage puthalata nolabunu ekata punchi dukak mata thiyenawa.
eya 100% niwaradiya.

wipassi, sikhi, wessabhu , kakusanda, konagamana, kashyapa yana mahabodhisathwayo mawukusin bihiwu kenehima sama wu pathulwalin polowehi sita siyalu dishawan bala dewiyan wisin chamara sesath osawa sitiyadi uthuru dishawa bala satha piyawarak idiriyata gamana kota “aggo hamasmi lokassa” yanadin abhitha wu sinhanadayak kalaha.
prashna kirim awasanaye yoshithage prakashaya thamata kiyawa balimata awashya bawa janadhipathi nithignyawaraya polis kosthapalta pawasa thibe.
dawasak oyawage pirimi lamayi dennek ape gedarata aawa.
mahinda rajapaksha nawatha balayata eema sahathika bawa mul dina waladima penenta thibunu nisaya.
sudu atha anith athunta wada pinwath, wadi salakili labana, nuwana athi, usas gathi pawathum athi, lesa piliganeyi.
eya me waraya hadapu nisa thama udghoshana kale.

deshiya sinamawa poshana kirimata kalaya, shramaya kapa kota wishramikawa sitina kalakaruwan agaya kirima pinisa masika dimanawak pradanaya kirime samarambhaka uthsawaya janadhipathi maithripala sirisena mahathage pradhanathwayen eeye (15da) jathika chithrapata sansthawe tharangani sinama shalawedi pawathwini.

man kawadawath amma diha kari widiyata balala nathi unath dan mole pakata bahala thiyena welawe amma haraha hamagana aapu hulagakuth nahaya wida gena giya..
dan sankhyathayath wadi kaloth thawath hondin eya sidu wenawa.

gedara gihin oya kasi tika mage ada ayine janel padiya udin pili welakata ahuranawa...ee janelaya kawadawath lesiyakata arina ekaka neweyi..ee hinda aarakshawa gana gataluwak naha..kamare thibunu anith

seks kiyanne kalawak, eka igana ganna oona, badala wayif kenek innawa nam layibr ekak ma gedara wage thamayi, nikamma nikan thel maru karaganna nathuwa poddak eekige paththen hithapan,
passe mama shri lankawata paminiya...”*

kolambaa disthrikkaya - warga kilomitara 642, gampaha disthrikkaya - warga kilomitara 1386.6, kaluthara disthrikkaya - warga kilo mitara 1606 daha hatharawana siyawasa mulbhagayedi yuropaya pura pathira giya maha durbhikshayen saha mahamariyen pasu 1350 pamana loka janagahanaya miliyana 350 k dakwa pahala giya bawa asthamenthu kota atha.
buduradunge magapenwimen awurudu ekasiya wissak diga...
(kolambaa, lankapuwath) –aasiyanu dal pandu shuratha tharangawaliye shurathawaya dina ganimata shri lanka kandayama eeye (09) samath wiya.

wada karanna ekathu pahada wela inna kattiya kammali nathuwa wada karagena yana nisa siripada aakruthiye idikirim katayuthu dan pimi panimin idiriyata yanawa,sanwidhana katayuthu sakachcha wenneth wadakarana gaman gahak uda hari attalayak uda hari kattiya ekathuwelayi,ithin wesak poyata sathiyak withara thiyaddi mulika idikirim wadatika awasanakarala nimakirima hadawada damima aadiya patangaththa siripathulakuth hadala gahauda pihitewwa,ethanata kapuwek thiyannath kathawela kapuwa hatiyata malanlage siya hendirik wa thora gaththa,eelangata karanna thibunu wadagathma de niwedana saha pracharaka katayuthu karanna kenek soya ganimayi,elle mach enawuns karalayi game podi podi niwedana katayuthu karalayi niwedakayek hatiyata game prasiddha wela hitapu mawa ee thanathurata gahak uda indala nitharangayenma thoragena thibuna,siripada aakruthiya pennanna dawas dekathunaka indala mama uda ispikarayak bandapu piyadasa mudalalige wan eke gama awatapita ganwala hama thanama pracharaye giya...
